title: Cant log in my account after transfer
body: So i transferred my smurf account from LAN server to NA, i had to change my username and my ingame name because it was already taken in NA server. I changed it and went to NA, i logged in successfully and everything was good. I played 2 games on NA proof: https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=dominican+deft and then i logged out but later i couldnt log in the account. It says that the username/password are incorrect and im pretty sure it is correct. Need help because now i think my account is lost. Op.gg of the account when it was in LAN: https://lan.op.gg/summoner/userName=im+2+beast. I sended 2 tickets yesterday but still no answer. Please help.

replies.body: When you get to the login screen, does it show the correct region?  It may not have saved and trying to connect you to the wrong server.  If not, hit us up in a ticket through our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help get you back on the account and right place.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
Yeah, it is in the correct server, someone is helping me already. Thanks a lot.
